text:
I'm trying to run ejbjar in 1.5 beta, and keep getting the message "Unable to 
load dependency analyzer: 
org.apache.tools.ant.util.depend.bcel.AncestorAnalyzer", even though I included 
optional.jar in the classpath.
creator: gadler@directv.com

text:
The default behaviour from previoius version of Ant is for ejbjar to add super
classes to the generated jar. This functionality now requires that you provide
the jakarta-BCEL library. If it is not present, you will get the message you
have seen. 

Please refer to the documentation of the dependency attribute for more
information. You can set this attribute so that it will not require the
ancestoir analyzer.

I've added some more info to WHATSNEW to warn people to expect this message.

Thanks
creator: conor@apache.org
